column1: What is the correct syntax to declare a main method in Java?, "public static void main(String[] args)", "void main()", "public static void main()", "static void main(String args[])", "A"
Which of the following is not a primitive data type in Java?, "int", "boolean", "double", "String", "D"
Which keyword is used to define a constant variable?, "constant", "final", "static", "const", "B"
Which operator is used for logical AND in Java?, "|", "&", "&&", "||", "C"
What is the default value of a boolean variable in Java?, "true", "false", "null", "0", "B"
Which loop is best used when the number of iterations is known?, "while", "do-while", "for", "switch", "C"
What does JVM stand for?, "Java Virtual Machine", "Java Visual Mode", "Java Verified Memory", "Java Variable Module", "A"
What keyword is used to inherit a class in Java?, "inherits", "extends", "implements", "super", "B;C"
Which package is automatically imported in every Java program?, "java.io", "java.net", "java.lang", "java.util", "C"
